message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my budget. How about we set the product price at $95?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let me see if I can meet you halfway. How about we set the product price at $100?
